author: Maria Grazia Alastra
description:
With Skin Saver you can always carry with you the list of ingredients to avoid in cosmetics, look for them quickly and add new ones! With Skin Saver you can always carry with you the list of ingredients to avoid in cosmetics (such as moisturizers, shampoos, etc), look for them quickly and add new ones or modify the existing ones, offline! Features:
  • Predefined list containing over 30 ingredients to avoid, accompanied by a brief description, viewable and editable offline, thanks to local storage and caching;
  • Ability to add new ingredients;
  • Ability to modify name and/or description of the ingredients, and to remove them, both from the list activity and from the search activity;
  • Ability to restore the predefined list;
  • Ability to search for ingredients (the research is case-insensitive!)
**************** This app is NOT an exhaustive list of ingredients to avoid, nor you should take the informations about the ingredients to avoid as definitive, since they represent just the opinion of the author (me). This app is meant to be customizable, since every person has its own needs and opinions: maybe you are comfortable with silicones - in this case you can remove or ignore all the silicones in the list; or maybe you are allergic to some ingredient not included in the list - in this case you can add it. New to INCI? Read here ! If you have problems, questions, suggestions, or any sort of feedback to give, you can write me a mail at the following address: alastra [dot] mariagrazia [at] gmail [dot] com All information concerning the ingredients on the list have been acquired through the youtube channel Carlitadolce cosmetici naturali and through the reading of Lola's forum
